price: Mu vy’ukuri, abafashe igishusho c’ishashi y’inka bakagisenga, bazoshikirwa n’ishavu ry’Imana yabo Rurema Allah, banasuzugurike mu buzima bwo kw’isi kubera igarariza ry’Imana Allah. Ni nk’ukwo nyene rero Duhemba abarementanya ivyadukano mw’idini.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ ٱلۡعِجۡلَ سَيَنَالُهُمۡ غَضَبٞ مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡ وَذِلَّةٞ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلۡمُفۡتَرِينَ

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ittakhadhū al-ʿij'la sayanāluhum ghaḍabun min rabbihim wadhillatun fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wakadhālika najzī al-muf'tarīna
